name: Darkness Dollar
description: "DARKNESS FINANCE - The First Multi-Fractional-Algorithmic stablecoin With Stablecoins Dex on Cronos Chain DUSD (Dark Dollar) is a stablecoin pegged around $1, partially backed by collateral like USDC, USDT and DAI and partially backed algorithmically by DARK and NESS. The ratio of collateralized and algorithmic, so-called Collateral Ratio (CR), depends on the market price of DUSD"
